features: CONNECT SEAMLESSLY: The dual-mode connectivity incorporates a 2.4GHz wireless and a Bluetooth 5.0 connection so you can pair and connect to almost any PC via your preferred mode. Widely compatible, this mouse works with a variety of operating systems, including Windows, Mac, Chrome, Linux and Android.

BUILT TO LAST: Work for up to 36 months on a single battery without having to be concerned with battery replacements. Dell Advanced Exchange Service ships you a replacement unit the next business day should your mouse be faulty within the three-year warranty.

CUSTOMIZE AND MANAGE: Intuitively positioned shortcut buttons on the mouse allow easy navigation across web pages and applications. The Dell Peripheral Manager software lets you customize and manage your keyboards and mice efficiently.
body.description: Connect seamlessly and customize easily with the new Dell Mobile Pro Wireless Mouse – MS5120W.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 789 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Connect seamlessly The dual-mode connectivity incorporates a 2.4GHz wireless and a Bluetooth 5.0 connection so you can pair and connect to almost any PC via your preferred mode.

Easy Pairing Pair your mouse to your Windows laptop via Bluetooth instantly using Microsoft Swift Pair, so you do not need to configure in Windows settings every time. This mouse is also compatible with a variety of operating systems, including Windows, Mac, Chrome, Linux and Android.

Simply reliable Dell’s Advanced Exchange Service ships you a replacement unit the next business day. Rigorous testing across Dell systems ensures your mouse is fully reliable and primed, making deployment easier across hundreds of Dell systems. Precise tracking A 1600 DPI sensor ensures this Dell Mobile Pro Wireless Mouse - MS5120W handles high-resolution screens easily. Its optical sensor offers accurate tracking and is ideal on most desk surfaces. Quick access Intuitively positioned shortcut buttons allow easy navigation across web pages and applications. Browse back and forth efficiently between pages onscreen effortlessly. Simple Management The Dell Peripheral Manager lets you customize and manage your keyboards and mice. Pair your devices, program shortcut buttons for quick access to your preferred applications and functions, and get battery and connectivity status and the latest firmware updates — whatever suits your business needs.

Built to last Work for up to 36 months on a single battery — that's three times longer than previous-generation models — and forget about having to recharge daily, weekly or even monthly. This lets you get on with your tasks smoothly without having to be concerned with battery replacements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good mouse
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse! It was easy to install and has worked perfectly. It really was a good purchase and I would recommend to anybody.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wireless mouse.
reviews.reviewText: The Bluetooth mouse I use at work started to disconnect randomly. Cleaning, batteries, remove and reinstall... nothing fixed it. I looked around on Amazon and bought the Tecknet based on reviews. What a mistake! I wrote a review on that one. Terrible mouse. Avoid it. I didn't even waste my time to return it. It felt good to throw it in the trash.I like Dell equipment. My work laptop is Dell. My gaming PC is Dell Alienware. Love them. So, I spent about 30% more on this Dell mouse and I love it. One AA battery so it is not heavy. Slightly beveled sides (wider on the top) so it's easy to pick up if needed. Very comfortable in the hand and is symmetrical so it's great for left handers too. I called it a wireless mouse because it works with an included USB dongle or with your native Bluetooth. The dongle stores inside if not used. Easy to set up - follow the instructions because there is an option to link to Bluetooth or the dongle. You can switch between the two, indicated on the bottom. The power switch is good. I only turn it off when it's in my backpack. On the desk, it sleeps and wakes seemlessly. The optical sensor on the bottom works onall surfaces and there is no red laser to blind you when you look for the switch. You can adjust the dots per inch sensitivity for your needs. This helps me for drawing sketches with the mouse. There are buttons. The usual left, middle, and right. The middle button is a wide scroll wheel, and it works as left and tight tilt, too. Two thumb buttons (for right hand use). All buttons are configurable through the provided application. I'm not using them for anything yet, but it's a nice option.All-in-all I highly recommend this inexpensive wireless mouse for every day use. I have an expensive Alienware wired gaming mouse specificly for gaming use. But for work documentation, occasional CAD use, surfing the web, this is my new favorite. Dell MS5120W.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dell Wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mouse that I have for both computers and they do work slick and I don't have to use the one on the laptop since I've thought about a mouse that might work easier for both computers since I can go back and forth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well, accurate movement, sleek design, comfortable to hold
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this mouse for 6 months so far and have not had to change the batteries. It sees use M-5 and I haven't changed the battery yet. I've enjoyed using it. As a gamer, I was worried about a wireless mouse because a prior one would drop connection randomly but this uses bluetooth and has seen no issues in missed input. I'm a 5'10" male and it fits well in my hand but I could see this being an issue for anyone who uses XL gloves but for anyone smaller than me it would fit better. The design is really clean and simple which makes it look like it belongs anywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mouse could be slightly larger, and the back space button set back a little and slightly larger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would not recommend buying this item.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this item and it did not work. Returned it and received another one and it worked for a few days, returned that one and received another replacement and that one worked a couple days and died. Did not want another one. Would not recommend buying. I thought buying Dell would be a good product, NOT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with purchase
reviews.reviewText: It comes with a dongle if preferred. I used the built-in Bluetooth instead. Fast wake-up compared to all others I've owned. Nice texture and color
Funciona a la prefección, muy comodo y resistente.

Though I got the exact product, the piece wasn't fresh (there are a few scratches on the mouse). It was a couple of year old product, with the seal opened and stuck back on, quite a few times. I guess these reasons contribute to the price slashing. I've decided to use the mouse and not return it, since it's working fine (on the first day, at least). I hope my decision doesn't backfire. I must admit that I didn't expect an unsealed product at this price point.

Después de poco tiempo dejó de funcionar la función de conección por vía Bluetooth. Eso me dio tristeza porque esa función fue la razón por la que decidí comprar ese ratón. Además de eso funciona bien hasta ahorita.
This is the best mouse i've ever used. Been using it for years

—Actualización—Funciono muy bien los primeros días, después de congela si lo dejas de usar, actualice controladores pero pasa lo mismo. No funciona bien en BluetoothEl mouse funciona muy bien en Bluetooth, es el mejor que he encontrado hasta ahora.Probé otro Dell que no sirve y un Logitech que se traba pero este mouse es increíble, lo recomiendo totalmente!
